description:
Course Description

Want to use video marketing to generate leads, boost profits, and help spread the message of your business? Not sure how to get started with video marketing? Or what gear you need? Or how to create a YouTube marketing video that doesn't suck?

Or what you got to do to make sure your video marketing efforts get watched and consumed? And not throw into YouTube video exile?

Well...wonder no more!

Because in my new course "Video Marketing Made (Ridiculously) Easy" I will walk you through step-by-step the process of Planning, Producing, Publishing & Promoting the Ultimate Lead-Generatin', Profit-Boostin' Online Video.

Materials Included

The course includes video lessons - along with transcripts and cheat sheets - walking you step-by-step from idea to execution to publishing (and promoting) of your online videos.

Length of Course

Each lesson is about 10 minutes long. (And the exercises outlined in the cheat sheets should take you no more than 15-20 minutes.) It's realistic you could have your video produced and published in less than a week.

Why Take the Course?

Because video marketing frickin' works! (And I promise it'll work for you!)
title: Video Marketing Made (Ridiculously) Easy
